Constructor Detail

WatchdogTimer

public WatchdogTimer(Watchdog watchdog,
                     long refreshTime,
                     long maxTimeOut)
Initializes the watchdog timer, in a pause state.

Parameters:
watchdog - the watchdog.
refreshTime - the time between each time check, in milliseconds.
maxTimeOut - the maximum time allowed for each AI execution, in milliseconds.
Method Detail

Runs the watchdog timer and times each AI execution.
